channel.title: CPH:NOVOB on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in CPH:NOVOB on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Novo Picks Insider as CEO After Selloff From Wegovy Slump
item.description: Novo Nordisk A/S named its head of international operations as chief executive officer after slumping weight-loss drug sales led to a profit warning that wiped $93 billion off its market value.
